bases.name: Alice Charcoal Detox Soap Base
bases.description: A deep-cleansing base enriched with activated charcoal. Gently removes dirt and toxins for a fresh, purified glow. Ideal for oily or acne-prone skin.

bases.name: Alice Goat Milk Nourishing Soap Base
bases.description: A creamy, luxurious base infused with goat milk for rich hydration. Perfect for dry and sensitive skin, leaving it soft, smooth, and radiant.

bases.name: Alice Shea Butter Moisturizing Soap Base
bases.description: Infused with shea butter to deeply moisturize and nourish the skin. Ideal for creating creamy, rich, and softening handmade soaps.

bases.name: Alice Orange Glow Soap Base
bases.description: A vibrant citrus base with the goodness of orange extracts. Helps brighten dull skin and adds a refreshing aroma to every wash.

bases.name: Alice Green Tea Antioxidant Soap Base
bases.description: Infused with real green tea extracts to refresh and purify the skin. A natural antioxidant base perfect for gentle daily cleansing.

bases.name: Alice Green Apple Refreshing Soap Base
bases.description: A fruity green apple base that rejuvenates and tones the skin. Creates a crisp and energizing cleansing experience.

bases.name: Alice Lavender Calm Soap Base
bases.description: Enriched with calming lavender essential oils. Relaxes the senses and soothes the skin with every wash.

bases.name: Alice Neem Tulsi Herbal Soap Base
bases.description: A traditional Ayurvedic blend of neem and tulsi. Purifies and protects the skin from impurities and pollution.

bases.name: Alice Pink Papaya Brightening Soap Base
bases.description: Made with papaya extracts for naturally glowing skin. Helps reduce pigmentation and enhances your natural radiance.

bases.name: Alice Papaya Enzyme Soap Base
bases.description: Rich in papain enzymes that help exfoliate dead skin cells. Creates bright, refreshed, and clear skin.

bases.name: Alice Aloe Vera Hydrating Soap Base
bases.description: Infused with aloe vera for cooling and hydration. Ideal for all skin types, especially for daily gentle cleansing.

bases.name: Alice Chandan Sandalwood Soap Base
bases.description: Infused with pure sandalwood oil for a soothing fragrance and radiant skin. A perfect base for premium aromatic soaps.

bases.name: Alice Chocolate Indulgence Soap Base
bases.description: A rich chocolate-infused base full of antioxidants. Moisturizes the skin and leaves it smelling divine.

bases.name: Alice Coffee Scrub Soap Base
bases.description: Enriched with coffee granules to exfoliate and awaken dull skin. Boosts circulation and improves texture naturally.

bases.name: Alice Cucumber Cooling Soap Base
bases.description: A refreshing cucumber-based soap base that soothes and hydrates. Perfect for hot climates and all-day freshness.

bases.name: Alice Multani Mitti Clay Soap Base
bases.description: Infused with natural multani mitti for detox and oil control. Gives the skin a soft, matte glow after every wash.

bases.name: Alice Mint Fresh Soap Base
bases.description: A cool mint-infused base that refreshes the skin and invigorates the senses. Ideal for summer soap bars.

bases.name: Alice Red Wine Luxury Soap Base
bases.description: Infused with the antioxidants of red wine, this base enhances skin elasticity and gives a youthful glow. Ideal for anti-aging and radiant skin bars.
